attributes.action: Stop ignoring the real cause of congestion and pollution on our roads by restricting the use of HGVs and moving more freight by rail
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/HGV-off-the-road/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
